title: Beamforming for Massive MIMO Aerial Communications: A Robust and Scalable DRL Approach
summary: This paper presents a distributed beamforming framework for a constellation of airborne platform stations (APSs) in a massive Multiple-Input and Multiple-Output (MIMO) non-terrestrial network (NTN) that targets the downlink sum-rate maximization under imperfect local channel state information (CSI).
